Class KaraWorld.DialogUtils

java.lang.Object
  KaraWorld.DialogUtils
Enclosing class:
KaraWorld
public static class KaraWorld.DialogUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class for managing dialogs to ensure they are opened in the Event Dispatch Thread.

Constructor Summary

static int showConfirmDialogEdt(java.awt.Component parentComponent, java.lang.Object message, java.lang.String title, int optionType)

showSaveDialogEdt

public static int showSaveDialogEdt(javax.swing.JFileChooser fileChooser,
                                    java.awt.Component parent)
Calls JFileChooser.showSaveDialog(Component) and ensures it is called on the Event Dispatch Thread.

Parameters:
fileChooser - the file chooser where showSaveDialog should be called on.
parent - the parent component of the dialog; can be null
Returns:
the return state of the file chooser on popdown:
  • JFileChooser.CANCEL_OPTION
  • JFileChooser.APPROVE_OPTION
  • JFileChooser.ERROR_OPTION if an error occurs or the dialog is dismissed
